title: F1 2018
notes: Game displays errors (probably when trying to save files - mostly when editing options) by showing new dialog windows. This steals window focus away from game and freezes it. Often buttons stop working after that

title: F1 2018
notes:
The game asks everytime you start for controller settings, just close it and continue. 

Loading a grand prix didn't work at first for me, it said that there are not enough file descriptors available. I increased it in /etc/security/limits.conf with '* soft nofile 16384' and '* hard nofile 16384'. That numbers might be a bit high, since I also have a lot of vscode instance open in the background.

Turn off particles, otherwise there are strange red particle artifacts.

The sound crackles here and there, but overall good.

I'm using a RX 470 with medium settings, and solid 60 fps (haven't tried higher settings, because of laziness).

title: F1 2018
notes: Benchmark Mode (Australia, Heavy Rain, 1 Lap): High Preset, 1080p, Avg 75fps

title: F1 2018
notes: Slight hiccups on FPS as seen on windows, but very slightly more prominent.
Pretty big stutters which feels like the game is running at 15-20 FPS (Steam shows 65 FPS)
title: F1 2018
